sen.j: 湖東三山（ことうさんざん）は、西明寺、金剛輪寺、百済寺の三つの天台宗寺院の総称。
sen.e: Koto-sanzan (the three temples in the east of Lake Biwa) collectively means three Tendai Sect temples, namely Saimei-ji Temple, Kongorin-ji Temple, and Hyakusai-ji Temple.

sen.j: 琵琶湖の東、鈴鹿山脈の西山腹に位置し、永源寺 (東近江市)と共に紅葉の名所として知られている。
sen.e: They are located in the east of Lake Biwa and the west side of the Suzuka mountain range, and are known as beautiful colored autumnal leaves together with Eigen-ji Temple in Higashiomi City.
